title: Sever
overview: The six-part series will be the story of a promising criminalist who believes in justice and honor, so he will not remain indifferent to the corruption of his superiors. However, he is subsequently punished for this and the investigator thus becomes the investigator. The dramatic series is based on the attractive environment of the police, with several lines and surprising twists that allow us to know how the strongest state power organization works in all its components, their connections and rivalries.
